clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used in the treatment of cholesterol gallstones Tauroursodeoxycholic acid is also being investigated for use in several conditions such as Primary Biliary Cirrhosis PBC insulin resistance amyloidosis Cystic Fibrosis Cholestasis and Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
